phrase
  1. Where's the toilet / bathroom? - Otȟáŋkaye kiŋ tuktél úŋ he?

name
  1. the Two Kettle Lakota, one of the seven tribes of the Lakota

name
  1. The Seven Council Fires, the traditional political structure of the Lakota people of the northern United States. It refers to seven communities within three regional groups: the Lakota, the Western Dakota, and the Eastern Dakota.
  2. The Lakota people, or the speakers of the Lakota language.

name
  1. the Blackfoot sioux, the Sihasapa, one of the seven tribes of the Lakota
  2. the Blackfoot tribe, an Algonquian tribe.

name
  1. the Sisseton tribe. one of the four eastern Dakota tribes

name
  1. the Burned Thigh Lakota, Brulé, one of the seven tribes of the Lakota

phrase
  1. Have a good journey - Taŋyáŋ ománi (m>sg)
  2. Have a good journey - Taŋyáŋ ománi ye (f>sg)
  3. Have a good journey - Taŋyáŋ ománi po (m>pl)
  4. Have a good journey - Taŋyáŋ ománi pe (f>pl)

noun
  1. February (second month of the year, having 28 days).

name
  1. (uncommon) Teton, general term for all the Lakota tribes

phrase
  1. How are you? Tókheškhe yaúŋ he?
  2. How are you? Toníktuha he?
  3. How are you? Taŋyáŋ yaúŋ he?

  2. Pleased to meet you - Wíyuškiŋyaŋ waŋčhíŋyaŋke (f)

  1. thus it is/was/happened indeed, and so it is/was

  1. the inner area of the camp circle, the center of a camp circle
  2. altar, ceremonial ground

pron
  1. he, she, it (3rd-person singular pronoun)
  2. they (3rd-person plural pronoun)

verb
  1. to cause to rattle/rustle/ring/jingle by striking (refers to a high-pitched rattle containing fine pebbles)

verb
  1. to make something, create something, construct something
  2. to establish
  3. to appoint, to nominate
  4. to represent, to perform (as a ceremony)

noun
  1. earth, ground, soil, dust
  2. earth, the world, nature
  3. land, estate

  1. tókhiya lá he/hwo? - where are you going? (he/hwo=female/male)

adv

  3. forward (spatially), towards the front

adv

  2. into the future (temporally forwards)
  3. forward (spatially), towards the front

pron
  1. first person plural exclusive
  2. first person plural inclusive

noun
  1. sacred spiritual power

adv
  1. sacredly, magically, in a holy manner

verb
  1. to be endowed with spiritual power, be holy, be sacred
  2. to be incomprehensible, mysterious, wonderful, magical

noun
  1. white person, Caucasian, white people
  2. a non-Indian

  4. greedy person, dishonorable person

num
  1. one (1)

det
  1. one
  2. any, someone

verb
  1. to be one, be one of a specified group

noun
  1. dried sweet corn, green corn preserved by drying

verb
  1. to be senseless, to be foolish, to behave in a crazy way

noun
  1. peace.
  2. the traditional way of life and culture of the Lakota people.

noun
  1. Thanks given for all of existence and the blessing inherent in each moment of it. Often used in ceremony, and as a broad statement of thanks within a community.

intj
  1. thank you.

noun
  1. sun, luminary
  2. moon, luminary
  3. month

intj
  1. tsk, expression of mild annoyance (uttered in a very high pitch; used by women)

noun
  1. a two-spirit; a male-bodied person who has a feminine or third-gender/bigender gender role and is regarded as having special spiritual talents
  2. (in more recent usage) a gay man

verb
  1. to sit
  2. to stay, to remain somewhere
  3. to be, to be located

verb
  1. yellow (to be yellow, or pale as if sick)

verb
  1. to take part in, participate in, join in, be present at (takes postposition él (“at, in, to”))
  2. to join somebody

  3. in order to (used after kta)

character

phrase
